programme.title: Outsmarting Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Test cook Dan Souza shows host Julia Collin Davison how to make the ultimate Roast Turkey. Next, gadget expert Lisa McManus uncovers the best oven thermometers. Finally, test cook Becky Hays uncovers the secrets to Foolproof Boiled Corn.

programme.title: Vibrant Mediterranean Cooking
programme.desc: Dan makes foolproof swordfish skewers with tomato caponata. Becky makes Egyptian-inspired barley salad.

programme.title: Three-Cup Chicken and Smashed Cucumbers
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster prepare three-cup chicken. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop conducts a tasting of firm tofu. Next, test cook Keith Dresser makes Bridget a refreshing dish of smashed cucumbers.

programme.title: Mexican Fare
programme.desc: Crispy tacos; dry vermouth; fire extinguishers; fast-freezing liquid nitrogen; roasted poblano and black bean enchiladas.

programme.title: Cooking at Home with Bridget and Julia
programme.sub-title: Cooking at Home With Bridget and Julia
programme.desc: Hearty beef and vegetable stew; 13x9-inch glass baking dishes; the science behind the sound and flavor of food; cod baked in foil with leeks and carrots.

programme.title: Texas Chili
programme.desc: We wanted a chili that would be hearty, heavy on the meat, and spicy but not overwhelmingly hot.

programme.title: American Casseroles
programme.desc: Macaroni and cheese and turkey Tetrazzini are two classic casseroles, but they are rarely as good as they could be. We knew we could do better-much better-in the test kitchen.

programme.title: Easy Sheet Cakes
programme.desc: The test kitchen decided to tackle two popular sheet cakes: carrot and chocolate, produce simple recipes.

programme.title: Pot Roast
programme.desc: Pot roast can be tender and succulent. We found that cooking technique matters just as much as the cut.

programme.title: Pissaladiere
programme.desc: Pissaladière is Provençal dish with black olives and anchovies on top of caramelized onions and thyme.

programme.title: Bake Sale Favorites
programme.desc: Brownies and blondies can often miss the mark. We kept things simple, focusing on superior flavor and texture.

programme.title: Summer Fruit Desserts
programme.desc: In this episode we take a look at two summer favorites: blueberry cobbler and free-form fruit tart.

programme.title: One-Skillet Dinners
programme.desc: When most people think of dishes like lasagna and jambalaya, they think of labor-intensive weekend meals. In this episode, however, we develop versions that could be prepared on a busy weeknight.

programme.title: Strawberry Cream Cake
programme.desc: Looking for a drop-dead-gorgeous summer dessert? Look no further than strawberry cream cake-a snazzier, more presentable version of strawberry shortcake.

programme.title: Barbecued Brisket and Corn Fritters

programme.title: Deep-Dish Apple Pie
programme.desc: With its mounds of tender apples and flaky pastry crust, deep-dish apple pie should take your breath away.

programme.title: Pork Chops and Tenderloin
programme.desc: We develop a foolproof preparation for pork chops with vinegar and peppers, plus pan-roasted pork tenderloin.

programme.title: Meatloaf Dinner
programme.desc: We set out to make meatloaf with seasoned meat and just enough binder to give the loaf a tender texture.

programme.title: Two Ways with Pork
programme.desc: Boneless pork chops and pork tenderloin are lean and quick-cooking, making them ideal for weeknight meals.

programme.title: Texas Barbecue Brisket
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof makes host Julia Collin Davison a tender and delicious Texas Barbecue Brisket. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried shows host Bridget Lancaster his top pick of coolers.

programme.title: Regional Italian-American Favorites
programme.desc: Bryan makes New York Prosciutto Bread and Ashley makes the easiest-ever Drop Meatballs.

programme.title: Pork and Pierogi
programme.desc: Julia and Bridget make Cider-Braised Pork Roast and Bryan makes Pittsburgh Potato-Cheddar Pierogi.

programme.title: The Italian American Kitchen
programme.desc: Ashley makes the ultimate Sausage Ragu and Bryan makes Fluffy Baked Polenta with Red Sauce.

programme.title: Comfort Food Done Right
programme.desc: Christie and Bridget make Double-Crust chicken Pot Pie. Ashley makes Cowboy Cookies.

programme.title: A Trip to the Big Easy
programme.sub-title: A Trip to the Big Easy
programme.desc: Bryan and Julia make a New Orleans classic, Shrimp Po Boys. Ashley and Bridget make Chicken Sauce Piquant.

programme.title: When Only Chocolate Will Do
programme.desc: Julia and Bridget make Mississippi Mud Pie and Bridget makes Whoopie Pies.

programme.title: Plenty of Garlic and Parm
programme.desc: We make California-style garlic fried chicken and unforgettable crispy Parmesan potatoes.

programme.title: Holiday Roast and Potatoes
programme.desc: Bridget and Julia make Rib Roast with Yorkshire Pudding. Ashley makes a recipe for Lighthouse Inn Potatoes.

programme.title: Tristate Treats
programme.desc: New Jersey crumb buns; nonstick skillets; a streamlined recipe for cheese blintzes with raspberry sauce.

programme.title: Pantry Pastas
programme.desc: Bridget makes Pasta e Ceci and elle makes the ultimate Penne Arrabbiata.

programme.title: Big Easy Favorites
programme.desc: Bridget and Julia make Chicken and Sausage Gumbo and Erin makes the best Red Beans and Rice.

programme.title: Cornish Hens and Pita on the Grill
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster prepare gai yang. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop conducts a tasting of tahini. Next, gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews grill tongs. And finally, test cook Dan Souza makes Bridget arayes.

programme.title: Vibrant Mediterranean Cooking
programme.desc: Dan makes foolproof swordfish skewers with tomato caponata. Becky makes Egyptian-inspired barley salad.

programme.title: Brunch Favorites
programme.desc: Julia and Bridget make Coffee Cake with Pecan-Cinnamon Streusel. Keith makes a Broccoli and Feta Frittata.

programme.title: Weeknight Italian
programme.desc: Dan makes the quickest One-Hour Pizza and Elle makes Beef Short Rib Ragu.

programme.title: Cookie Jar Favorites
programme.desc: Thick, chewy chocolate cookies and spiced molasses cookies are classics.

programme.title: New York Cheesecake
programme.desc: With a crisp graham cracker crust and a creamy filling, our cheesecake is worthy of any diner in New York.

programme.title: Summer Berry Desserts
programme.desc: We wanted a no-bake summer berry pie that was every bit as appealing as a traditional double-crust pie.

programme.title: The Pancakes Show
programme.desc: Few recipes deliver so much pleasure for so little work as pancakes. The batter comes together in minutes, and the cooking time is brief. Why, then, do most Americans never make pancakes from scratch?

programme.title: Grilled Chicken and Salmon
programme.sub-title: New Flavors for Old Grilled Favorites
programme.desc: In this episode we prepare grilled chicken with a dipping sauce and grilled salmon with a sweet, sticky glaze.

programme.title: In an Italian-American Kitchen
programme.desc: Our recipes for eggplant Parmesan and pasta with chicken and broccoli give them the respect they deserve.

programme.title: Let's Talk Turkey
programme.desc: With our recipes for these Thanksgiving standards, we minimize the work so everyone can enjoy the holiday.

programme.title: Let's Talk Turkey
programme.desc: With our recipes for these Thanksgiving standards, we minimize the work so everyone can enjoy the holiday.

programme.title: Faster Family Favorites
programme.desc: We make a quick tamale pie with a quick homemade-cornbread topping and chicken stew with a biscuit crust.

programme.desc: Fish tacos are about as SoCal as it gets, and on this visit to San Diego, Ali takes Rush fishing on a rockfish and lobster grocery run; slow-pitch jigging and hoop netting are the techniques of choice and the rewards are delicious.

programme.desc: Early winter in Key West means wahoo is on everyone's mind; Ali and Rush are ready to put in the lures and the time to get it done; once the conditions line up it's time to go all in, wahoo or bust.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: Fish tacos are about as SoCal as it gets, and on this visit to San Diego, Ali takes Rush fishing on a rockfish and lobster grocery run; slow-pitch jigging and hoop netting are the techniques of choice and the rewards are delicious.

programme.title: Life on the Water

programme.title: Guidelines

programme.title: Guidelines
programme.desc: Jay teams up with Johnny Stabile in the Florida Everglades to get some peacock bass on fly.

programme.title: Guidelines

programme.title: Green Dragon Inn
programme.desc: When an evil land baron's son murders an innocent family, a Marshal is called in to escort him to be executed in the court of law far to the north. With the aid of an army of soldiers, the Marshal must fight off the Land Baron's assassins.

programme.title: Bruce's Fists of Vengeance
programme.desc: Two fighters (Bruce Le, Jack Lee) protect their master's secrets.

programme.title: High Sky Mission aka American Force 3: High Sky Mission
Dragon's Claws
programme.desc: An exiled member of the Dragon boxing sect challenges the current leader to a duel.

programme.title: Layout aka Hero from Shanghai
programme.desc: A Chinese government agent fights Japanese spies and his own countrymen in the early 1920s.

programme.title: Martial Arts History Museum Biography: Graciela Casillas
programme.desc: The museum honors this pioneer of women's kickboxing who became the first fighter to hold world titles in both boxing and kickboxing in 1979.

programme.title: Bruce - Kung Fu Girls
programme.desc: Five pretty girls go to Hong Kong to stay with their uncle who is a police superintendent. Soon they run into a gang of thieves, which gives them a chance to put their excellent kung fu skills to good use. This Bod Squad will kick your ass!

programme.title: Kung Fu Executioner
programme.desc: Li, a martial artist, returns home to find out that his father is being harassed by a crime syndicate. Together with an American kung fu champion, he vows revenge when the syndicate kills his father.

programme.title: Lady Constables
programme.desc: Two female and one male (the strong, silent type) constables compete to recapture the Night-Shining Pearl, stolen by the Four Chiefs, who are led by the treacherous White Haired General Coldwater Tiger.

programme.title: Super Powerful Man
programme.desc: The son of a Manchu government official vows revenge on the experts who defeated Manchu boxers.

programme.title: Martial Hero
programme.desc: The story is about a humble man known as the Canton Kid, who just happens to have extraordinary kung fu talent. When the Town Triads team up with a warlord they bring the town to its knees, the Canton kid steps in to restore the peace.

programme.title: Fist of Fury Part 3 (WITHDRAWN TEMP)
programme.desc: Bruce Li comes back home after the death of his brother. He takes revenge on the drug smuggling ring lead by the Japanese, which killed his brother and even killed his mother.

programme.title: Ring of Death
programme.desc: An underdog, mistreated by his family, seeks redemption after being given kung fu lessons from an unlikely source.

programme.title: 7 Commandments Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: An Assassin adopts a new disciple from an old Kung Fu master. He teaches him the mantis kung fu in the hope that his new protégé will continue his killing for him. Awesome action follows!

programme.title: Crystal Fist aka Jade Claw
programme.desc: A young man vows revenge against the killers of his father. To do this, he must train with his father's teacher, who teaches him the "Shadow Claw", a deadly combination of the Eagle Claw and Shadow Fist.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: As usual, contestants face different games like The Qualifier, The Sweeper, The Dreadmill and the grand final on The Wipeout Zone. While the game keeps going, Amanda Byram interviews contestants to find out how they are doing during the episode.

programme.title: The Almost Impossible Gameshow

programme.title: Wipeout Canada
programme.desc: Beam andJets,Field Goal Swing, The Toothbrush Bristles, Tippy Tables and Dock Maze are among some of the over-the-top obstacles in this week's episode.
